channel.title: Hardwood on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Hardwood on Simba Tango

item.title: Nice floor
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ Simba tango Simba found a new cage. It has the most lovely hardwood floor. Parquet. Yum-ba! We’ll see how much milongas there will be in the new town, but Simba already started patrolling the new territory with enrosques and paradas thrown in here and there. And it is smooooth! So at least some private dancing inside the cave, while guarding the offspring. I must admit floors mean a lot more to me after dancing tango for a while than they did before.
